amendment.description: To conform citizen suits under the Endangered Species Act of 1973.

vote.text: Amendment SA 33, under the order of 1/21/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 45. Record Vote Number: 7.

action.text: Amendment SA 33 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S268; text: CR S268) To conform citizen suits under the Endangered Species Act of 1973.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 33, under the order of 1/21/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 45. Record Vote Number: 7.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 33, under the order of 1/21/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 45. Record Vote Number: 7.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 33 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 2.
